SELECT id as roleId, role_name as roleName, created_time as createdTime, record_status as recordStatus FROM `tb_sys_role` where `record_status` != 0
and role_name like CONCAT('%', #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and record_status=#{recordStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY created_time desc,id desc
